name: The Mission of a Polo and Xsplorer
name_original: The Mission of a Polo and Xsplorer
description: Play as two Sherpastannais astronauts: Paulo and Xsplorer on a lunar mission. In this co-op game, you will have to do everything to keep your rocket in good condition until it reaches its destination. The problem? Your country has sent you in a lowcost rocket: Leaks, overheating and cable breakdown will be there!
